original_english: If you have a weakened immune system due to AIDS, cancer, transplantation, or corticosteroid use, call your doctor if you develop a cough, fever, or shortness of breath.
translated_spanish: Si tiene un sistema inmunitario debilitado debido al SIDA, cáncer, trasplante o uso de corticosteroides, llame a su médico si desarrolla tos, fiebre o dificultad para respirar.
back_translated_english: If you have a weakened immune system due to AIDS, cancer, transplant, or use of corticosteroids, call your doctor if you develop a cough, fever, or difficulty breathing.

original_english: Do NOT place the person in this position if a head, neck, back, or leg injury is suspected or if it makes the victim uncomfortable.
translated_spanish: NO coloque a la persona en esta posición si se sospecha de una lesión en la cabeza, el cuello, la espalda o las piernas, o si le causa incomodidad a la víctima.
back_translated_english: DO NOT place the person in this position if a head, neck, back, or leg injury is suspected, or if it causes discomfort to the victim.

original_english: Increased vision allows the infant to tell objects apart from backgrounds with very little contrast (such as a button on a blouse of the same color)
translated_spanish: La visión aumentada le permite al bebé distinguir objetos de fondos con muy poco contraste (como un botón en una blusa del mismo color).
back_translated_english: Enhanced vision allows the infant to distinguish objects from backgrounds with very little contrast (like a button on a blouse of the same color).

original_english: If obesity prevents you from being physically able to inspect your feet, ask a family member, neighbor, or visiting nurse to perform this important check.
translated_spanish: Si la obesidad le impide inspeccionar físicamente sus pies, pida a un familiar, vecino o enfermera visitante que realice esta importante revisión.
back_translated_english: If obesity prevents you from physically inspecting your feet, ask a family member, neighbor, or visiting nurse to perform this important check.

original_english: CT scan or MRI to confirm that there is a growth, and to see if the cancer has spread to lymph nodes in the neck
translated_spanish: Tomografía computarizada o resonancia magnética para confirmar que hay un crecimiento y para ver si el cáncer se ha diseminado a los ganglios linfáticos en el cuello.
back_translated_english: Computed tomography or magnetic resonance imaging to confirm that there is a growth and to see if the cancer has spread to the lymph nodes in the neck.

original_english: A uniform brown color is usually seen over the cheeks, forehead, nose, or upper lip.It is most often symmetrical (matching on both sides of the face).
translated_spanish: Un color marrón uniforme se observa generalmente en las mejillas, la frente, la nariz o el labio superior. A menudo es simétrico (coincidiendo en ambos lados de la cara).
back_translated_english: A uniform brown color is usually observed on the cheeks, forehead, nose, or upper lip. It is often symmetrical (matching on both sides of the face).

original_english: Your doctor may do other tests to check high blood pressure, heart disease, diabetes, high cholesterol, and other causes of, and risk factors for TIAs or stroke.
translated_spanish: Su médico puede realizar otros exámenes para verificar la hipertensión arterial, enfermedades del corazón, diabetes, colesterol alto y otras causas y factores de riesgo para los AIT o accidentes cerebrovasculares.
back_translated_english: Your doctor may perform other tests to check for high blood pressure, heart diseases, diabetes, high cholesterol, and other causes and risk factors for TIAs or strokes.

original_english: Stridor is an abnormal, high-pitched, musical breathing sound caused by a blockage in the throat or voice box (larynx).It is usually heard when taking in a breath.
translated_spanish: El estridor es un sonido respiratorio anormal, agudo y musical causado por una obstrucción en la garganta o en la caja de la voz (laringe). Generalmente se escucha al inhalar.
back_translated_english: Stridor is an abnormal, high-pitched, musical breath sound caused by an obstruction in the throat or voice box (larynx). It is generally heard on inhalation.

original_english: Is there blood on the toilet paper only?
translated_spanish: ¿Hay sangre solo en el papel higiénico?
back_translated_english: Is there blood only on the toilet paper?

original_english: Ask your health care provider.
translated_spanish: Pregunte a su médico.
back_translated_english: Ask your doctor.

original_english: Complete bed rest for several days is usually recommended.
translated_spanish: El reposo absoluto en cama durante varios días suele ser recomendado.
back_translated_english: Complete bed rest for several days is usually recommended.

original_english: They still have foot problems after treatment
translated_spanish: Aún tienen problemas en los pies después del tratamiento.
back_translated_english: They still have problems with their feet after treatment.

original_english: Disorders of the endocrine system
translated_spanish: Trastornos del sistema endocrino
back_translated_english: Endocrine system disorders

original_english: Biopsy - breast; Open breast biopsy
translated_spanish: Biopsia - mama; Biopsia abierta de mama
back_translated_english: Biopsy - breast; Open breast biopsy

original_english: Are illegal drugs being used?
translated_spanish: ¿Se están utilizando drogas ilegales?
back_translated_english: Are illegal drugs being used?

original_english: Preventive measures vary depending on the specific disorder.
translated_spanish: Las medidas preventivas varían según el trastorno específico.
back_translated_english: Preventive measures vary depending on the specific disorder.

original_english: Some laboratories use different measurements or may test different specimens.
translated_spanish: Algunos laboratorios usan diferentes medidas o pueden evaluar distintas muestras.
back_translated_english: Some laboratories use different measurements or may evaluate different specimens.

original_english: Menopause. A drop in the hormone estrogen causes vaginal dryness.
translated_spanish: Menopausia. Una disminución en la hormona estrógeno causa resequedad vaginal.
back_translated_english: Menopause. A decrease in the hormone estrogen causes vaginal dryness.

original_english: Depression and older age are both risk factors for suicide.
translated_spanish: La depresión y la edad avanzada son ambos factores de riesgo para el suicidio.
back_translated_english: Depression and advanced age are both risk factors for suicide.

original_english: Most women have only one polyp, but some women have two or three.
translated_spanish: La mayoría de las mujeres tienen solo un pólipo, pero algunas mujeres tienen dos o tres.
back_translated_english: Most women have only one polyp, but some women have two or three.

original_english: This test is done to measure the level of amino acids in the blood.
translated_spanish: Este examen se realiza para medir el nivel de aminoácidos en la sangre.
back_translated_english: This test is performed to measure the level of amino acids in the blood.

original_english: The infection is spread by saliva, urine, respiratory droplets, sexual contact, and blood transfusions.
translated_spanish: La infección se transmite a través de la saliva, la orina, las gotas respiratorias, el contacto sexual y las transfusiones de sangre.
back_translated_english: The infection is transmitted through saliva, urine, respiratory droplets, sexual contact, and blood transfusions.

original_english: You may occasionally eat lean, 3-ounce cuts of red meat.
translated_spanish: Puede comer ocasionalmente cortes magros de carne roja de 3 onzas.
back_translated_english: You can occasionally eat lean cuts of red meat of 3 ounces.

original_english: Several conditions may cause increased pressure in the skull, including:
translated_spanish: Varias condiciones pueden causar un aumento de presión en el cráneo, incluyendo:
back_translated_english: Several conditions can cause an increase in pressure in the skull, including:

original_english: Abnormal heart sounds
translated_spanish: Ruidos cardíacos anormales
back_translated_english: Abnormal heart sounds

original_english: Waxy, yellow surface
translated_spanish: Superficie cerosa y amarilla
back_translated_english: Waxy and yellow surface

original_english: Oxygen
translated_spanish: Oxígeno
back_translated_english: Oxygen

original_english: Recent open heart surgery
translated_spanish: Cirugía a corazón abierto reciente.
back_translated_english: Recent open-heart surgery.

original_english: Thyroid disease
translated_spanish: Enfermedad tiroidea
back_translated_english: Thyroid disease

original_english: Nausea
translated_spanish: Náuseas
back_translated_english: Nausea

original_english: Brussels sproutsCabbage
translated_spanish: Bralas de BruselasCol rizada
back_translated_english: Brussels sprouts curly cabbage

original_english: Oysters
translated_spanish: Ostras
back_translated_english: Oysters

original_english: CPR can be lifesaving, but it is best done by someone trained in an accredited CPR course.
translated_spanish: La RCP puede salvar vidas, pero es mejor que la realice alguien capacitado en un curso de RCP acreditado.
back_translated_english: CPR (cardiopulmonary resuscitation) can save lives, but it is best performed by someone trained in an accredited CPR course.

original_english: Always let your doctor know about any cold, flu, fever, herpes breakout, or other illnesses you may have.
translated_spanish: Siempre informe a su médico sobre cualquier resfriado, gripe, fiebre, brote de herpes u otras enfermedades que pueda tener.
back_translated_english: Always inform your doctor about any cold, flu, fever, herpes outbreak, or other illnesses you may have.

original_english: Tretinoin (Retin-A) or creams containing alpha-hydroxy acids may be recommended, but these aren't guaranteed to help.
translated_spanish: Se puede recomendar tretinoína (Retin-A) o cremas que contengan ácidos alfa-hidroxi, pero no se garantiza que ayuden.
back_translated_english: Tretinoin (Retin-A) or creams that contain alpha-hydroxy acids may be recommended, but there is no guarantee that they will help.

original_english: Fever is the classic symptom and may persist for days before any other symptoms appear.
translated_spanish: La fiebre es el síntoma clásico y puede persistir durante días antes de que aparezcan otros síntomas.
back_translated_english: Fever is the classic symptom and may persist for days before other symptoms appear.

original_english: There is more likely to be increased amounts of pollen in the air on hot, dry, windy days.
translated_spanish: Es más probable que haya mayores cantidades de polen en el aire en días calurosos, secos y ventosos.
back_translated_english: There are likely to be higher amounts of pollen in the air on hot, dry, and windy days.

original_english: You get iron through certain foods, and your body also reuses iron from old red blood cells.
translated_spanish: Usted obtiene hierro a través de ciertos alimentos, y su cuerpo también reutiliza el hierro de los glóbulos rojos viejos.
back_translated_english: You obtain iron from certain foods, and your body also reuses iron from old red blood cells.

original_english: Asthma symptoms usually occur much less often or disappear as the child gets get older.
translated_spanish: Los síntomas del asma generalmente ocurren con mucha menos frecuencia o desaparecen a medida que el niño crece.
back_translated_english: The symptoms of asthma generally occur much less frequently or disappear as the child grows.

original_english: Potatoes that are not green and have had any sprouts removed are safe to eat.
translated_spanish: Las papas que no están verdes y a las que se les han quitado los brotes son seguras para comer.
back_translated_english: Potatoes that are not green and have had the sprouts removed are safe to eat.

original_english: When the needle is inserted to draw blood, you may feel moderate pain, or only a prick or stinging sensation.
translated_spanish: Cuando se introduce la aguja para extraer la sangre, puede sentir un dolor moderado, o sólo un pinchazo o picadura.
back_translated_english: When the needle is inserted to draw blood, you may feel moderate pain, or just a prick or stinging sensation.

original_english: However, as a general rule, once a substance causes allergies for an individual, it can continue to affect the person long term.
translated_spanish: Sin embargo, como regla general, una vez que una sustancia causa alergias en un individuo, puede seguir afectando a la persona a largo plazo.
back_translated_english: However, as a general rule, once a substance causes allergies in an individual, it may continue to affect the person in the long term.

original_english: If you have surgery, your sperm count will likely increase but it will not improve your chances of getting a woman pregnant.
translated_spanish: Si se somete a cirugía, es probable que su conteo de espermatozoides aumente, pero no mejorará sus posibilidades de embarazar a una mujer.
back_translated_english: If you undergo surgery, it is likely that your sperm count will increase, but it will not improve your chances of impregnating a woman.

original_english: Screening women with pelvic ultrasound or blood tests, such as the Ca-125 has not been found to be effective and is not recommended.
translated_spanish: La detección en mujeres mediante ecografía pélvica o análisis de sangre, como el Ca-125, no ha demostrado ser efectiva y no se recomienda.
back_translated_english: Screening in women using pelvic ultrasound or blood tests, such as Ca-125, has not proven to be effective and is not recommended.

original_english: Protein can also be used by the body for energy, but only after glycogen or carbohydrate stores have been used up.
translated_spanish: La proteína también puede ser utilizada por el cuerpo para obtener energía, pero solo después de que se hayan agotado las reservas de glucógeno o carbohidratos.
back_translated_english: Protein can also be used by the body to obtain energy, but only after glycogen or carbohydrate reserves have been depleted.

original_english: An extradural hemorrhage is bleeding between the inside of the skull and the outer covering of the brain (called the "dura").
translated_spanish: Una hemorragia extradural es el sangrado entre el interior del cráneo y la cubierta externa del cerebro (llamada "dura").
back_translated_english: An epidural hemorrhage is the bleeding between the inside of the skull and the outer covering of the brain (called "dura").

original_english: Without PIG-A, important proteins cannot connect to the cell surface and protect the cell from substances in the blood called complement.
translated_spanish: Sin PIG-A, proteínas importantes no pueden conectarse a la superficie celular y proteger la célula de sustancias en la sangre llamadas complemento.
back_translated_english: Without PIG-A, important proteins cannot attach to the cell surface and protect the cell from substances in the blood called complement.

original_english: If you can see bone in the injured site, call your local emergency number (such as 911) or local hospital for further advice.
translated_spanish: Si puede ver hueso en el sitio de la lesión, llame al número local de emergencias (como el 911 en los Estados Unidos) o al hospital local en busca de recomendaciones adicionales.
back_translated_english: If you can see bone at the site of the injury, call your local emergency number (such as 911 in the United States) or the local hospital for further advice.

original_english: Bladder distention (urinary bladder over-filled with fluid) can cause a firm mass in the center of the lower abdomen above the pelvic bones.In extreme cases it can reach as far up as the navel.
translated_spanish: La distensión vesical (vejiga urinaria sobrellenada de líquido) puede causar una masa firme en el centro del abdomen inferior, por encima de los huesos pélvicos. En casos extremos, puede llegar hasta el ombligo.
back_translated_english: Bladder distension (urinary bladder overfilled with fluid) can cause a firm mass in the center of the lower abdomen, above the pelvic bones. In extreme cases, it can reach up to the navel.

original_english: Your kidneys help control your body's acid level by removing acid from the blood and sending it into your urine.Acidic substances in the body are counteracted by alkaline substances, primarily bicarbonate.
translated_spanish: Sus riñones ayudan a controlar el nivel de ácido en su cuerpo al eliminar el ácido de la sangre y enviarlo a su orina. Las sustancias ácidas en el cuerpo son contrarrestadas por sustancias alcalinas, principalmente bicarbonato.
back_translated_english: Your kidneys help control the level of acid in your body by removing acid from the blood and sending it to your urine. Acidic substances in the body are counteracted by alkaline substances, primarily bicarbonate.

original_english: You'll likely be diagnosed with rheumatic fever if you meet two major criteria, or one major and two minor criteria, and have signs that you've had a previous strep infection.
translated_spanish: Es probable que se te diagnostique fiebre reumática si cumples con dos criterios mayores, o uno mayor y dos menores, y tienes signos de que has tenido una infección previa por estreptococos.
back_translated_english: You are likely to be diagnosed with rheumatic fever if you meet two major criteria, or one major and two minor criteria, and have signs of a previous streptococcal infection.

original_english: A trained physician, often a cardiologist, inserts a small needle into the chest between the ribs and into the thin sac that surrounds the heart (the pericardium).A small amount of fluid is taken out.
translated_spanish: Un médico entrenado, con frecuencia un cardiólogo, introduce una pequeña aguja en el tórax, entre las costillas y en el saco delgado que rodea el corazón (el pericardio). Se extrae una pequeña cantidad de líquido.
back_translated_english: A trained physician, often a cardiologist, inserts a small needle into the chest, between the ribs and into the thin sac that surrounds the heart (the pericardium). A small amount of fluid is removed.

original_english: Increased calcium for a limited period of time does not normally cause side effects.However, receiving higher amounts of calcium over a long period of time raises the risk of kidney stones in some people.
translated_spanish: El aumento de calcio por un período limitado de tiempo normalmente no causa efectos secundarios. Sin embargo, recibir cantidades más altas de calcio durante un período prolongado aumenta el riesgo de cálculos renales en algunas personas.
back_translated_english: The increase in calcium for a limited period of time normally does not cause side effects. However, receiving higher amounts of calcium for an extended period increases the risk of kidney stones in some individuals.

original_english: Children with early sexual development are more likely to have psychological and social problems.Children and adolescents generally want to be the same as their peers, and early sexual development can make them appear different.
translated_spanish: Los niños con un desarrollo sexual temprano tienen más probabilidades de presentar problemas psicológicos y sociales. Los niños y adolescentes generalmente desean ser iguales a sus compañeros, y el desarrollo sexual temprano puede hacer que parezcan diferentes.
back_translated_english: Children with early sexual development are more likely to experience psychological and social problems. Children and adolescents generally want to be like their peers, and early sexual development can make them appear different.

original_english: Veins and arteries vary in size from one patient to another and from one side of the body to the other.Obtaining a blood sample from some people may be more difficult than from others.
translated_spanish: Las venas y las arterias varían en tamaño de un paciente a otro y de un lado del cuerpo a otro. Obtener una muestra de sangre de algunas personas puede ser más difícil que de otras.
back_translated_english: Veins and arteries vary in size from one patient to another and from one side of the body to the other. Obtaining a blood sample from some people may be more difficult than from others.

original_english: In many cases it will prevent you from getting sick.For example, a person who has had chickenpox or has been immunized against chickenpox is immune from getting chickenpox again.Watch this video about:Immune response
translated_spanish: En muchos casos, esto le evitará enfermarse. Por ejemplo, una persona que ha tenido varicela o que ha sido inmunizada contra la varicela es inmune a contraer varicela nuevamente. Mire este video sobre: Respuesta inmune.
back_translated_english: In many cases, this will prevent you from getting sick. For example, a person who has had chickenpox or who has been vaccinated against chickenpox is immune to contracting chickenpox again. Watch this video about: Immune response.

original_english: For example, a food that has 13 grams of fat with a Percent Daily Value of 20% means that 13 grams of fat is 20%, or one-fifth, of the total daily fat recommended for a person who eats 2,000 calories per day.
translated_spanish: Por ejemplo, un alimento que tiene 13 gramos de grasa con un Porcentaje del Valor Diario del 20% significa que 13 gramos de grasa son el 20%, o un quinto, del total de grasa diaria recomendada para una persona que consume 2,000 calorías al día.
back_translated_english: For example, a food that has 13 grams of fat with a Percent Daily Value of 20% means that 13 grams of fat is 20%, or one fifth, of the total daily recommended fat for a person consuming 2,000 calories per day.

original_english: Laparoscopic repair: Your surgeon will make 3 - 5 small cuts in your belly.Your surgeon will insert a laparoscope (a thin, hollow tube with a tiny camera on the end) through one of these cuts and other tools through the other cuts.
translated_spanish: Reparación laparoscópica: Su cirujano hará de 3 a 5 pequeñas incisiones en su abdomen. Su cirujano insertará un laparoscopio (un tubo delgado y hueco con una pequeña cámara en el extremo) a través de una de estas incisiones y otras herramientas a través de las otras incisiones.
back_translated_english: Laparoscopic repair: Your surgeon will make 3 to 5 small incisions in your abdomen. Your surgeon will insert a laparoscope (a thin, hollow tube with a small camera on the end) through one of these incisions and other instruments through the other incisions.

original_english: However, recent studies do not support this idea, and suggest that these medications can be used in children with tics who also have attention-deficit disorder (which often occurs in the same group of children).A chronic motor tic disorder also exists.
translated_spanish: Sin embargo, estudios recientes no apoyan esta idea y sugieren que estos medicamentos pueden ser utilizados en niños con tics que también tienen trastorno por déficit de atención (que a menudo ocurre en el mismo grupo de niños). También existe un trastorno crónico de tics motores.
back_translated_english: However, recent studies do not support this idea and suggest that these medications may be used in children with tics who also have attention deficit disorder (which often occurs in the same group of children). There is also a chronic disorder of motor tics.

original_english: These symptoms are more likely to occur if the skin has been cut or rubbed because this gives the MRSA germ a way to “get in.” Symptoms are also more likely in areas where there is more body hair due to hair follicles.
translated_spanish: Estos síntomas son más propensos a ocurrir si la piel ha sido cortada o frotada, ya que esto le da al germen de MRSA una forma de "entrar". Los síntomas también son más probables en áreas donde hay más vello corporal debido a los folículos pilosos.
back_translated_english: These symptoms are more likely to occur if the skin has been cut or rubbed, as this provides the MRSA germ a way to "enter." Symptoms are also more likely in areas where there is more body hair due to hair follicles.

original_english: Some patients develop heart failure and high blood pressure in the blood vessels of their lungs.Your chances of recovering or of the disease getting worse depend on the cause and how severe the disease was when it was first diagnosed.
translated_spanish: Algunos pacientes desarrollan insuficiencia cardíaca e hipertensión en los vasos sanguíneos de sus pulmones. Sus posibilidades de recuperación o de que la enfermedad empeore dependen de la causa y de cuán grave fue la enfermedad cuando se diagnosticó por primera vez.
back_translated_english: Some patients develop heart failure and hypertension in the blood vessels of their lungs. Their chances of recovery or of the disease worsening depend on the cause and how severe the disease was when it was first diagnosed.

original_english: If a young child refuses to put weight on an arm or leg after an accident, won't move the arm or leg, or you can clearly see a deformity, assume the child has a broken bone and get medical help.
translated_spanish: Si un niño pequeño se niega a apoyar peso en un brazo o una pierna después de un accidente, no mueve el brazo o la pierna, o puede ver claramente una deformidad, asuma que el niño tiene un hueso roto y busque ayuda médica.
back_translated_english: If a small child refuses to put weight on an arm or a leg after an accident, does not move the arm or leg, or if a deformity is clearly visible, assume that the child has a broken bone and seek medical help.

original_english: The amount of liquid you eat (such as soup) or drink will be limited to the amount of urine you can produce.You will be told what you may and may not eat to reduce the buildup of toxins that the kidneys would normally remove.
translated_spanish: La cantidad de líquido que ingieras (como sopa) o bebas será limitada a la cantidad de orina que puedas producir. Se te indicará qué puedes y qué no puedes comer para reducir la acumulación de toxinas que los riñones normalmente eliminarían.
back_translated_english: The amount of fluid you consume (such as soup) or drink will be limited to the amount of urine you can produce. You will be instructed on what you can and cannot eat to reduce the buildup of toxins that the kidneys would normally eliminate.

original_english: The most common use of this test is to help diagnose and monitor a disorder called sarcoidosis . People with sarcoidosis may have their ACE levels tested regularly to check the severity of the disease and see how well treatment is working.
translated_spanish: El uso más común de esta prueba es ayudar a diagnosticar y monitorear un trastorno llamado sarcoidosis. Las personas con sarcoidosis pueden tener sus niveles de ACE evaluados regularmente para comprobar la gravedad de la enfermedad y ver qué tan bien está funcionando el tratamiento.
back_translated_english: The most common use of this test is to help diagnose and monitor a condition called sarcoidosis. People with sarcoidosis may have their ACE levels evaluated regularly to check the severity of the disease and see how well the treatment is working.

original_english: Allergic conjunctivitis occurs when the clear layer of tissue lining the eyelids and covering the white of the eye (conjunctiva) become swollen or inflamed due to a reaction to pollen, dander, mold, or other allergy-causing substances.
translated_spanish: La conjuntivitis alérgica ocurre cuando la capa clara de tejido que recubre los párpados y cubre la parte blanca del ojo (conjuntiva) se hincha o inflama debido a una reacción al polen, caspa, moho u otras sustancias que causan alergias.
back_translated_english: Allergic conjunctivitis occurs when the clear layer of tissue that lines the eyelids and covers the white part of the eye (conjunctiva) swells or inflames due to a reaction to pollen, pet dander, mold, or other substances that cause allergies.

original_english: Advance care directives allow patients to provide instructions about their preferences regarding the care they would like to receive if they develop an illness or a life-threatening injury and are unable to express their preferences.
translated_spanish: Las directrices anticipadas de atención permiten a los pacientes proporcionar instrucciones sobre sus preferencias respecto al cuidado que les gustaría recibir si desarrollan una enfermedad o una lesión que amenace su vida y son incapaces de expresar sus preferencias.
back_translated_english: Advance care directives allow patients to provide instructions regarding their preferences for the care they would like to receive if they develop a life-threatening illness or injury and are unable to express their preferences.

original_english: People with this condition generally have a large left ventricle (the pumping chamber of the heart that supplies the body with blood), and a small right ventricle (the pumping chamber that supplies the lungs with blood).
translated_spanish: Las personas con esta condición generalmente tienen un ventrículo izquierdo grande (la cámara de bombeo del corazón que suministra sangre al cuerpo) y un ventrículo derecho pequeño (la cámara de bombeo que suministra sangre a los pulmones).
back_translated_english: People with this condition generally have a large left ventricle (the pumping chamber of the heart that supplies blood to the body) and a small right ventricle (the pumping chamber that supplies blood to the lungs).

original_english: In January 2001, the FDA's Center for Food Safety and Applied Nutrition proposed that developers of bioengineered food submit scientific and safety information to the FDA at least 120 days before the food is marketed.
translated_spanish: En enero de 2001, el Centro para la Seguridad Alimentaria y la Nutrición Aplicada de la FDA propuso que los desarrolladores de alimentos bioingeniería presenten información científica y de seguridad a la FDA al menos 120 días antes de que el alimento sea comercializado.
back_translated_english: In January 2001, the Center for Food Safety and Applied Nutrition of the FDA proposed that developers of bioengineered foods submit scientific and safety information to the FDA at least 120 days before the food is marketed.

original_english: Your health care provider will tell you if it's necessary to stop taking any drugs that may interfere with this test.Make sure that your doctor is aware of all drugs you are taking, both prescription and nonprescription.
translated_spanish: Su proveedor de atención médica le informará si es necesario dejar de tomar algún medicamento que pueda interferir con esta prueba. Asegúrese de que su médico esté al tanto de todos los medicamentos que está tomando, tanto los de prescripción como los de venta libre.
back_translated_english: Your health care provider will inform you if it is necessary to stop taking any medication that may interfere with this test. Make sure your doctor is aware of all the medications you are taking, both prescription and over-the-counter.

original_english: Other foods such as broccoli, cooked greens, and canned salmon (with bones) will also provide a source of calcium in the diet; however, it is often difficult to get children to consume adequate quantities of these foods.
translated_spanish: Otros alimentos como el brócoli, las verduras cocidas y el salmón enlatado (con espinas) también proporcionarán una fuente de calcio en la dieta; sin embargo, a menudo es difícil lograr que los niños consuman cantidades adecuadas de estos alimentos.
back_translated_english: Other foods such as broccoli, cooked vegetables, and canned salmon (with bones) will also provide a source of calcium in the diet; however, it is often difficult to get children to consume adequate amounts of these foods.

original_english: Transposition of the great vessels is a heart defect that occurs from birth (congenital). The two major vessels that carry blood away from the heart -- the aorta and the pulmonary artery -- are switched (transposed).
translated_spanish: La transposición de los grandes vasos es un defecto cardíaco que ocurre desde el nacimiento (congénito). Los dos grandes vasos que llevan sangre del corazón -- la aorta y la arteria pulmonar -- están intercambiados (transpuestos).
back_translated_english: Transposition of the great vessels is a heart defect that occurs from birth (congenital). The two major vessels that carry blood from the heart -- the aorta and the pulmonary artery -- are switched (transposed).

original_english: Your health care provider will examine you for signs of food poisoning, such as pain in the stomach and signs your body does not have as much water and fluids as it should.This is called dehydration.
translated_spanish: Su médico le examinará en busca de signos de intoxicación alimentaria, como dolor en el estómago y señales de que su cuerpo no tiene la cantidad adecuada de agua y líquidos. Esto se llama deshidratación.
back_translated_english: Your doctor will examine you for signs of food poisoning, such as stomach pain and signs that your body does not have the adequate amount of water and fluids. This is called dehydration.

original_english: An implantable cardioverter defibrillator (ICD) is a device that can be implanted in the chest wall of people who are at risk for this serious rhythm disorder. The ICD can help prevent sudden cardiac death by quickly sending an electrical shock when ventricular fibrillation occurs.
translated_spanish: Un desfibrilador cardioversor implantable (DCI) es un dispositivo que se puede implantar en la pared torácica de personas que están en riesgo de este grave trastorno del ritmo. El DCI puede ayudar a prevenir la muerte cardíaca súbita al enviar rápidamente una descarga eléctrica cuando ocurre la fibrilación ventricular.
back_translated_english: An implantable cardioverter-defibrillator (ICD) is a device that can be implanted in the chest wall of individuals at risk for this serious rhythm disorder. The ICD can help prevent sudden cardiac death by quickly delivering an electric shock when ventricular fibrillation occurs.

original_english: Greater respect for the complexities of female sexual functioning has led them to conclude that suboptimal female genitalia may not be inherently better than suboptimal male genitalia, even if the reconstruction is "easier."In addition, other factors may be more important in gender satisfaction than functioning external genitals.
translated_spanish: Un mayor respeto por las complejidades del funcionamiento sexual femenino les ha llevado a concluir que los genitales femeninos subóptimos pueden no ser inherentemente mejores que los genitales masculinos subóptimos, incluso si la reconstrucción es "más fácil". Además, otros factores pueden ser más importantes en la satisfacción de género que los genitales externos funcionales.
back_translated_english: A greater respect for the complexities of female sexual function has led them to conclude that suboptimal female genitals may not be inherently better than suboptimal male genitals, even if reconstruction is "easier." Furthermore, other factors may be more important in gender satisfaction than functional external genitals.

original_english: Regular use -- the user misses more and more school or work; worries about losing drug source; uses drugs to "fix" negative feelings; begins to stay away from friends and family; may change friends to those who are regular users; shows increased tolerance and ability to "handle" the drug.
translated_spanish: Uso regular: el usuario falta cada vez más a la escuela o al trabajo; se preocupa por perder la fuente de drogas; usa drogas para "arreglar" sentimientos negativos; comienza a alejarse de amigos y familiares; puede cambiar de amigos por aquellos que son consumidores regulares; muestra una mayor tolerancia y capacidad para "manejar" la droga.
back_translated_english: Regular use: the user increasingly misses school or work; worries about losing their source of drugs; uses drugs to "fix" negative feelings; begins to distance themselves from friends and family; may change friends for those who are regular users; shows increased tolerance and ability to "handle" the drug.

original_english: Increased intracranial pressure can be due to a rise in cerebrospinal fluid pressure.It can also be due to increased pressure within the brain matter caused by a mass (such as a tumor), bleeding into the brain or fluid around the brain, or swelling within the brain matter itself.
translated_spanish: El aumento de la presión intracraneal puede deberse a un aumento en la presión del líquido cefalorraquídeo. También puede ser causado por un aumento de la presión dentro de la sustancia cerebral debido a una masa (como un tumor), sangrado en el cerebro o líquido alrededor del cerebro, o hinchazón dentro de la sustancia cerebral misma.
back_translated_english: The increase in intracranial pressure may be due to an increase in the pressure of the cerebrospinal fluid. It can also be caused by an increase in pressure within the brain substance due to a mass (such as a tumor), bleeding in the brain or fluid around the brain, or swelling within the brain substance itself.

original_english: Some substances that are found to be harmful to people or animals may still be allowed, but only at the level of 1/100th of the amount that is considered harmful.People with any allergies or food intolerances should always check the ingredient list (label) for their own protection.
translated_spanish: Algunas sustancias que se consideran perjudiciales para las personas o los animales pueden seguir estando permitidas, pero solo en el nivel de 1/100 de la cantidad que se considera dañina. Las personas con alergias o intolerancias alimentarias deben siempre revisar la lista de ingredientes (etiqueta) para su propia protección.
back_translated_english: Some substances that are considered harmful to people or animals may still be permitted, but only at a level of 1/100 of the amount that is considered harmful. People with food allergies or intolerances should always check the ingredient list (label) for their own protection.

original_english: Not having milk in your diet can lead to a shortage of calcium, vitamin D, riboflavin, and protein.You may need to find new ways to get calcium into your diet (depending on your age and gender, you need 1,000 - 1,500 mg of calcium each day):
translated_spanish: No consumir leche en su dieta puede llevar a una deficiencia de calcio, vitamina D, riboflavina y proteína. Puede que necesite encontrar nuevas formas de incorporar calcio a su dieta (dependiendo de su edad y género, necesita entre 1,000 y 1,500 mg de calcio cada día):
back_translated_english: Not consuming milk in your diet can lead to a deficiency of calcium, vitamin D, riboflavin, and protein. You may need to find new ways to incorporate calcium into your diet (depending on your age and gender, you need between 1,000 and 1,500 mg of calcium each day):

original_english: Because it is difficult to determine the amount of radiation exposure from nuclear accidents, the best signs of the severity of the exposure are: the length of time between the exposure and the onset of symptoms, the severity of symptoms, and severity of changes in white blood cells.
translated_spanish: Debido a que es difícil determinar la cantidad de exposición a la radiación por accidentes nucleares, los mejores indicadores de la gravedad de la exposición son: el tiempo transcurrido entre la exposición y la aparición de síntomas, la gravedad de los síntomas y la severidad de los cambios en los glóbulos blancos.
back_translated_english: Due to the difficulty in determining the amount of radiation exposure from nuclear accidents, the best indicators of the severity of exposure are: the time elapsed between exposure and the onset of symptoms, the severity of the symptoms, and the severity of changes in white blood cells.

original_english: Note: It is often technically easier to treat (and therefore raise) the child as female (it is easier for a surgeon to make female genitalia than it is to make male genitalia), so in some cases this is recommended even if the child is genetically male.
translated_spanish: Nota: A menudo es técnicamente más fácil tratar (y por lo tanto criar) al niño como femenino (es más fácil para un cirujano crear genitales femeninos que crear genitales masculinos), por lo que en algunos casos se recomienda esto incluso si el niño es genéticamente masculino.
back_translated_english: Note: It is often technically easier to treat (and therefore raise) the child as female (it is easier for a surgeon to create female genitals than to create male genitals), so in some cases this is recommended even if the child is genetically male.

original_english: Deficiency happens more often in women than in men, and is more common in pregnant women and older children. Getting enough iodine in the diet may prevent a form of physical and mental retardation called cretinism.Cretinism is very rare in the U.S. because iodine deficiency is generally not a problem.
translated_spanish: La deficiencia ocurre con más frecuencia en mujeres que en hombres, y es más común en mujeres embarazadas y niños mayores. Obtener suficiente yodo en la dieta puede prevenir una forma de retraso físico y mental llamada cretinismo. El cretinismo es muy raro en los Estados Unidos porque la deficiencia de yodo generalmente no es un problema.
back_translated_english: Deficiency occurs more frequently in women than in men, and it is more common in pregnant women and older children. Obtaining enough iodine in the diet can prevent a form of physical and mental delay called cretinism. Cretinism is very rare in the United States because iodine deficiency is generally not a problem.

original_english: People who have a sudden herniated disk caused by injury (such as a car accident or lifting a very heavy object) will get nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory medications (NSAIDs) and narcotic painkillers if they have severe pain in the back and leg.If you have back spasms, you will usually receive muscle relaxants.
translated_spanish: Las personas que tienen una hernia de disco súbita causada por una lesión (como un accidente automovilístico o levantar un objeto muy pesado) recibirán medicamentos antiinflamatorios no esteroides (AINEs) y analgésicos narcóticos si tienen un dolor severo en la espalda y la pierna. Si tiene espasmos en la espalda, generalmente recibirá relajantes musculares.
back_translated_english: People who have a sudden herniated disk caused by an injury (such as a car accident or lifting a very heavy object) will receive nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drugs (NSAIDs) and narcotic pain relievers if they have severe pain in the back and leg. If you have back spasms, you will typically receive muscle relaxants.

original_english: Threre is a wide range for what is considered "normal." Just because your child is in the 15th percentile for weight (meaning 85 out of 100 children weigh more), this number rarely means your child is sick, you're not feeding your child enough, or your breast milk is not enough for your baby.
translated_spanish: Hay un amplio rango de lo que se considera "normal". Solo porque su hijo esté en el percentil 15 para el peso (lo que significa que 85 de cada 100 niños pesan más), este número rara vez indica que su hijo esté enfermo, que no le esté alimentando lo suficiente o que su leche materna no sea suficiente para su bebé.
back_translated_english: There is a wide range of what is considered "normal." Just because your child is in the 15th percentile for weight (which means that 85 out of every 100 children weigh more), this number rarely indicates that your child is sick, that you are not feeding them enough, or that your breast milk is insufficient for your baby.

original_english: Congenital heart surgery; Patent ductus arteriosus ligation; Hypoplastic left heart repair; Tetralogy of Fallot repair; Coarctation of the aorta repair; Atrial septal defect repair; Ventricular septal defect repair; Truncus arteriosus repair; Total anomalous pulmonary artery correction; Transposition of great vessels repair; Tricuspid atresia repair; VSD repair; ASD repair; PDA ligation
translated_spanish: Cirugía cardiaca congénita; Ligadura del conducto arterioso persistente; Reparación del corazón izquierdo hipoplásico; Reparación de la tetralogía de Fallot; Reparación de la coartación de la aorta; Reparación de la comunicación interauricular; Reparación de la comunicación interventricular; Reparación del tronco arterioso; Corrección de la arteria pulmonar anómala total; Reparación de la transposición de los grandes vasos; Reparación de la atresia tricuspídea; Reparación de la CIV; Reparación de la CIA; Ligadura del CAP.
back_translated_english: Congenital heart surgery; Ligation of the patent ductus arteriosus; Repair of hypoplastic left heart syndrome; Repair of tetralogy of Fallot; Repair of aortic coarctation; Repair of atrial septal defect; Repair of ventricular septal defect; Repair of truncus arteriosus; Correction of total anomalous pulmonary venous return; Repair of transposition of the great vessels; Repair of tricuspid atresia; Repair of VSD; Repair of ASD; Ligation of the PDA.

original_english: This test is done during a hospital stay.  It tells the difference between someone who is making urine because of drinking a lot of liquid and someone who is not.  If you have central diabetes insipidus, you will still make a lot of urine even when fluids are not given.
translated_spanish: Esta prueba se realiza durante una estancia en el hospital. Permite distinguir entre alguien que está produciendo orina debido a la ingesta de grandes cantidades de líquido y alguien que no lo está haciendo. Si tienes diabetes insípida central, seguirás produciendo mucha orina incluso cuando no se te administren líquidos.
back_translated_english: This test is performed during a hospital stay. It allows for the distinction between someone who is producing urine due to the intake of large amounts of fluid and someone who is not. If you have central diabetes insipidus, you will continue to produce a lot of urine even when you are not given fluids.

original_english: Also, many refined foods, such as white flour, sugar, and white rice, lack B vitamins and other important nutrients unless they are marked "enriched." It is healthiest to get carbohydrates, vitamins, and other nutrients in as natural a form as possible -- for example, from fruit instead of table sugar.
translated_spanish: Además, muchos alimentos refinados, como la harina blanca, el azúcar y el arroz blanco, carecen de vitaminas del complejo B y otros nutrientes importantes a menos que estén etiquetados como "enriquecidos". Es más saludable obtener carbohidratos, vitaminas y otros nutrientes en la forma más natural posible, por ejemplo, de la fruta en lugar de del azúcar de mesa.
back_translated_english: Additionally, many refined foods, such as white flour, sugar, and white rice, lack B vitamins and other important nutrients unless they are labeled as "enriched." It is healthier to obtain carbohydrates, vitamins, and other nutrients in the most natural form possible, for example, from fruit rather than from table sugar.

original_english: The pituitary gland near the brain makes too much of the hormone ACTH (called Cushing's disease), which may happen with too much growth of the pituitary gland, a tumor of the pituitary gland, or a tumor elsewhere in the body (such as the pancreas, lung, and thyroid) that produces ACTH
translated_spanish: La hipófisis cerca del cerebro produce demasiada hormona corticotropina (llamada enfermedad de Cushing), lo cual puede ocurrir debido al crecimiento excesivo de la glándula pituitaria, un tumor en la glándula pituitaria, o un tumor en otra parte del cuerpo (como el páncreas, el pulmón y la tiroides) que produce ACTH.
back_translated_english: The pituitary gland near the brain produces too much adrenocorticotropic hormone (called Cushing's disease), which may occur due to excess growth of the pituitary gland, a tumor in the pituitary gland, or a tumor in another part of the body (such as the pancreas, lung, and thyroid) that produces ACTH.

original_english: In the past, the prevailing opinion was that it was generally best to assign a gender as quickly as possible, often based on the external genitals rather than the chromosomal gender, and to instruct the parents to have no ambiguity in their minds as to the gender of the child.
translated_spanish: En el pasado, la opinión predominante era que generalmente era mejor asignar un género lo más rápido posible, a menudo basado en los genitales externos en lugar del género cromosómico, y se instruía a los padres a no tener ambigüedad en su mente respecto al género del niño.
back_translated_english: In the past, the prevailing opinion was that it was generally better to assign a gender as quickly as possible, often based on external genitalia rather than chromosomal gender, and parents were instructed not to have any ambiguity in their minds regarding the child's gender.

original_english: Daily preoccupation -- the user loses any motivation; does not care about school and work; has obvious behavior changes; thinking about drug use is more important than all other interests, including relationships; the user becomes secretive; may begin dealing drugs to help support habit; use of other, harder drugs may increase; legal problems may increase.
translated_spanish: Preocupación diaria: el usuario pierde toda motivación; no le importa la escuela ni el trabajo; presenta cambios evidentes en el comportamiento; pensar en el consumo de drogas se vuelve más importante que todos los demás intereses, incluidas las relaciones; el usuario se vuelve reservado; puede comenzar a vender drogas para ayudar a mantener su hábito; el uso de otras drogas más duras puede aumentar; los problemas legales pueden aumentar.
back_translated_english: Daily concern: the user loses all motivation; does not care about school or work; shows obvious changes in behavior; thinking about drug use becomes more important than all other interests, including relationships; the user becomes withdrawn; may start selling drugs to help support their habit; use of harder drugs may increase; legal problems may escalate.

original_english: You have sudden, sharp chest pain with shortness of breath, especially after a long trip, a stretch of bedrest (for example, following an operation), or other lack of movement, especially if one leg is swollen or more swollen than the other (this could be a blood clot, part of which has moved to the lungs).
translated_spanish: Tienes un dolor torácico agudo y repentino con dificultad para respirar, especialmente después de un viaje largo, un período de reposo en cama (por ejemplo, tras una operación) u otra falta de movimiento, especialmente si una pierna está hinchada o más hinchada que la otra (esto podría ser un coágulo de sangre, parte del cual se ha desplazado a los pulmones).
back_translated_english: You have sudden sharp chest pain with difficulty breathing, especially after a long trip, a period of bed rest (for example, after surgery), or another lack of movement, especially if one leg is swollen or more swollen than the other (this could be a blood clot, part of which has traveled to the lungs).

original_english: The mother may fake symptoms of illness in her child by adding blood to the child's urine or stool, withholding food, falsifying fevers, secretly giving the child drugs to make the child throw up or have diarrhea, or using other tricks, such as infecting intravenous (given through a vein) lines to make the child appear or become ill.
translated_spanish: La madre puede simular síntomas de enfermedad en su hijo añadiendo sangre a la orina o las heces del niño, reteniendo comida, falsificando fiebres, administrando en secreto medicamentos al niño para hacerlo vomitar o tener diarrea, o utilizando otros trucos, como infectar líneas intravenosas (administradas a través de una vena) para hacer que el niño parezca o se enferme.
back_translated_english: The mother may simulate symptoms of illness in her child by adding blood to the child's urine or stool, withholding food, faking fevers, secretly administering medications to the child to induce vomiting or diarrhea, or using other tricks, such as infecting intravenous lines (administered through a vein) to make the child appear or feel ill.

original_english: Because there is little or no flow out of the left heart, blood returning to the heart from the lungs needs to pass through the foramen ovale or an atrial septal defect (a hole connecting the collecting chambers on the left and right sides of the heart) back to the right side of the heart.
translated_spanish: Debido a que hay poco o ningún flujo hacia el lado izquierdo del corazón, la sangre que regresa al corazón desde los pulmones necesita pasar a través del foramen oval o una comunicación interauricular (un agujero que conecta las cámaras de recolección en los lados izquierdo y derecho del corazón) de regreso al lado derecho del corazón.
back_translated_english: Due to little or no flow to the left side of the heart, the blood returning to the heart from the lungs needs to pass through the foramen ovale or an atrial septal defect (a hole that connects the collecting chambers on the left and right sides of the heart) back to the right side of the heart.

original_english: You can take the tooth to the dentist by following one of these tips:Try to place the tooth back in the mouth where it fell out, so it is level with other teeth. Bite down gently on gauze or a wet tea bag to help keep it in place. Be careful not to swallow the tooth.
translated_spanish: Puede llevar el diente al dentista siguiendo uno de estos consejos: Intente colocar el diente de nuevo en la boca donde se cayó, para que esté al mismo nivel que los otros dientes. Muérdalo suavemente con una gasa o una bolsa de té húmeda para ayudar a mantenerlo en su lugar. Tenga cuidado de no tragarse el diente.
back_translated_english: You can take the tooth to the dentist by following one of these tips: Try to place the tooth back in the mouth where it fell out, so that it is at the same level as the other teeth. Gently bite down on it with a gauze or a damp tea bag to help keep it in place. Be careful not to swallow the tooth.

original_english: Another myth of adolescence is the idea that "it will never happen to me, only the other person." "It" may represent becoming pregnant or catching a sexually-transmitted disease after having unprotected sex, causing a car crash while driving under the influence of alcohol or drugs, or any of the many other negative effects of risk-taking behaviors.
translated_spanish: Otro mito de la adolescencia es la idea de que "nunca me pasará a mí, solo a la otra persona". "Eso" puede representar quedar embarazada o contraer una enfermedad de transmisión sexual después de tener relaciones sexuales sin protección, causar un accidente automovilístico mientras se conduce bajo la influencia del alcohol o las drogas, o cualquiera de los muchos otros efectos negativos de los comportamientos de riesgo.
back_translated_english: Another myth of adolescence is the idea that "it will never happen to me, only to someone else." "That" can represent getting pregnant or contracting a sexually transmitted disease after having unprotected sex, causing a car accident while driving under the influence of alcohol or drugs, or any of the many other negative effects of risky behaviors.

original_english: It is important to have the teeth cleaned thoroughly.This may involve use of various tools to loosen and remove plaque and tartar from the teeth. Proper flossing and brushing is always needed, even after professional tooth cleaning, to reduce your risk of gum disease. Your dentist or hygienist will show you how to brush and floss properly.
translated_spanish: Es importante limpiar los dientes a fondo. Esto puede implicar el uso de diversas herramientas para aflojar y eliminar la placa y el sarro de los dientes. El uso adecuado del hilo dental y el cepillado siempre es necesario, incluso después de una limpieza dental profesional, para reducir el riesgo de enfermedad de las encías. Su dentista o higienista le mostrará cómo cepillarse y usar el hilo dental correctamente.
back_translated_english: It is important to thoroughly clean the teeth. This may involve the use of various tools to loosen and remove plaque and tartar from the teeth. Proper use of dental floss and brushing is always necessary, even after a professional dental cleaning, to reduce the risk of gum disease. Your dentist or hygienist will show you how to brush and use dental floss correctly.

original_english: How well you do depends on the amount of poison swallowed and how quickly treatment is received.
translated_spanish: Cuán bien te va depende de la cantidad de veneno ingerido y de la rapidez con que se reciba el tratamiento.
back_translated_english: How well you do depends on the amount of venom ingested and the speed at which treatment is received.

original_english: Rarely, children will have problems falling asleep or staying asleep.
translated_spanish: Rara vez, los niños tendrán problemas para conciliar el sueño o mantenerse dormidos.
back_translated_english: Rarely, children will have trouble falling asleep or staying asleep.

original_english: Reye syndrome can occur when aspirin is used to treat children with viral infections, such as chickenpox or the flu.
translated_spanish: El síndrome de Reye puede ocurrir cuando se utiliza ácido acetilsalicílico (aspirina) para tratar a niños con infecciones virales, como la varicela o la gripe.
back_translated_english: Reye syndrome can occur when acetylsalicylic acid (aspirin) is used to treat children with viral infections, such as chickenpox or influenza.

original_english: Bili lights is a type of light therapy (phototherapy) that is used to treat newborn jaundice . Jaundice is a yellow coloring of the skin and eyes caused by too much of a substance called bilirubin.
translated_spanish: La terapia con luces Bili es un tipo de terapia lumínica (fototerapia) que se utiliza para tratar la ictericia en recién nacidos. La ictericia es un color amarillento de la piel y los ojos causado por un exceso de una sustancia llamada bilirrubina.
back_translated_english: Bili light therapy is a type of light therapy (phototherapy) used to treat jaundice in newborns. Jaundice is a yellowing of the skin and eyes caused by an excess of a substance called bilirubin.

original_english: Surgery combined with radiation therapy is often used to treat women with stage 1 disease that has a high chance of returning, has spread to the lymph nodes, or is a grade 2 or 3.
translated_spanish: La cirugía combinada con radioterapia se utiliza a menudo para tratar a mujeres con enfermedad en estadio 1 que tiene una alta probabilidad de recurrencia, se ha diseminado a los ganglios linfáticos o es de grado 2 o 3.
back_translated_english: Combined surgery with radiotherapy is often used to treat women with stage 1 disease that has a high probability of recurrence, has spread to the lymph nodes, or is grade 2 or 3.
